notesStmt.note:
A formulae of a marriage contract, of a release of claim on a property and of mezuzah (folio 43v), of tefilin (folio 44r), and of a power of attorney (folio 44v). Tinmont 5067 [1307]: date and origin in the formulae of a marriage contract and of a power of attorney. Luigi da Bologna: inscribed with his name: 'Revisto per mi fra Luigi da Bolgona del ordine de Sa' Domenico, Marzo 1599' (folio 30v); a converted Jew working for the Inquisition as censor (active at the end of the 16th-beginning of 17th century), see 104, and appendix § 112-117.
Camillo Jaghel: inscribed with his name, 1613 (folio 30v); see , appendix § 50-56.
Renato da Modena: inscribed with his name, 1626 (folio 30v); see , appendix § 132-133.
Fra Gir. Durazzano, active in 1640-41 in Modena-Reggio: inscribed with his name, 1640 (folio 30v); see , appendix § 89.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Halakhical works: Tashbets by Samson ben Zadok and Sefer ha-terumah by Baruch ben Isaac.

collation.p: 6 quires: i8 (folio 1-8), ii8 (folio 9-16), iii8 (folio 17-24), iv6 (folio 25-30), v2 (folio 31-32), vi8 (folio 33-40), vi4 (folio 41-44). Catchwords at the end of the quires.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi semi-cursive script of the 14th century, unpunctuated. Yehudah ha-Kohen: the words Yehudah and kohen are marked numerous times in the text (e.g. folio 7r, 7v, 8r, 12r, 16v, 26v, 31r, 43r).
